product_name: Wilderness Press Afoot and Afield: Las Vegas and Southern Nevada - Second Edition
long_description: The newly updated edition of Afoot and Afield: Las Vegas and Southern Nevada features more than 100 hikes within a couple hours' drive of the Las Vegas Strip.
short_description: The newly updated edition of Afoot and Afield: Las Vegas and Southern Nevada features more than 100 hikes within a couple hours' drive of the Las Vegas Strip.
